4.description:
Summary
This is a part-time gig for someone at a moderate forex trading level.  If you are brand new, this is not for you.  I am looking for a partner to day-trade forex markets during the American business hours starting at 8am.  I would trade from 9pm Asia, through Europe till 8am and pass the account to you and give you a written briefing.  I have a profitable unique quantitative strategy, with more details below.  
You’d be kicking in your own money into an account with my money and we’d split the profit.  I need a partner because I cannot handle the long hours by myself.   Below is information about me, the strategy, and what would be required of you.
What would be required of you
This assumes you are passionate about Global Macro and forex.  If you’re not already interested in being a trader, this isn’t going to work.  I am also expecting you’ve traded forex before for at least a few months, and are familiar with a lot the basics.
You can expect to make 10-20% on money you put into an account that we share.  Right now, I aim to make $150-200 per day, with a couple of days of having to sit out.  On a sit out day, you’d have to do nothing.
I am looking for a partner in the New York City/Tri-state area.  I live in New Jersey right across the George Washington bridge and I would have to meet you.  We would have to trust each other because you’d have access to my account and my P&L would reflect your decisions.
Hours
You’d be required to work 8am to 11am and occasionally in the afternoon as well if it’s a busy day. 
The trading day is broken up into 4 sections:
-Asian (9pm – 2am) –  I’d handle this
-European (2am to 8am) –  I’d handle this
-American morning (8am to 11am)  - You
-American afternoon (11am to 4pm) – Sometimes You, Usually Nothing and we sit out
About Me
I question the structure of our economic system and don’t agree with a monetary system based on debt.  This view of  fractional reserve banking would be classified as Austrian economics but I’ve added many of my own ideas upon the existing framework of Austrian authors.  My photo next to my economics reading is on this post  and you can find my writings at GlobalMacroForex.com
I’ve been trading spot forex and equity indexes for 2 years with live money, but reading a lot before.  My focus is on G7 Western Europe, America, Japan, and China.
About the Strategy
This is not technical analysis.  And it’s not fundamental, if you define fundamentals as government numbers or information from the news.  Instead, I have unique perspective on what drives markets and essentially, I am trading bank liquidity.  Nobody trades like me, so it’s hard to label it for you.
My “formulas” or ideas are ways of assessing bank supply, demand, and cycles.  Utilizing data scrapped off the internet and publicly available data from both government and private sources, my strategies give a view into the most probable scenarios on a 1-3 day timeframe.  It’s not a single data point, but a combination of objective formulas and ideas that mean certain outcomes.
This strategy combines some elements of rules based systematic thinking with discretionary implementation.  Each trade has an objective pre-defined minimum requirements, but which of the many trade choices that met the minimum or how long the trade is held is discretionary.

17.description:
Job Description For Lead Manager
POSITION
This is an amazing opportunity to learn the amazing world of real estate investing.
I’m a busy real estate investor and I do A LOT of marketing that generates calls from property owners that would like for me to purchase their property
Here’s how you can help me
• Listen to and transcribe the voice mail messages from property owners and input the information into our CRM
• Researching the property information left on the message by the property owner and add the information and details to our CRM
• You’ll also help me in preparing documents that are needed for the process of buying and selling the properties that I find. I’ll also need you to spend some time on the phone …...
• There are property owners that don’t leave enough information on their message, so you will call them and follow a simple script to ask them for details about their property.
• There are property owners that call in to our phone system… listen a pre-recorded message BUT instead of leaving a message they will just simply hang up and not leave a message. You’ll dial them and ask them if they have a property for sale.. If they do you’ll follow a simple script to gather the information and input the data into our CRM system.
• You’ll be following up on leads that I may have spoken with a few months back and you’ll call to find out if there is still an interest in selling their property.
This is NOT sales position.
You will not be required to sell or convince the property owners to sell their property or do business with us.
You’ll simply be a friendly voice that will ask them a series of questions so that our internal sales team can contact them.
REQUIREMENTS
There are a few MUST haves for us
• Friendly - you must come across as warm and friendly so that the customer can feel comfortable providing us with the necessary information about the property.
• You must type at least 50 words per minute - there is a lot of information that you’ll be typing as you listen to the voice mail messages and speak with the customer. So typing speed is a must have for us
• You like being on the phone and speaking with people - you’re going to be on the phone a lot during the day and so you have to be ok with that
• Team player - you’ll be a very important part of our real estate team and so you’ll need to work with the various other team players
• Highly organized - you’ll be working inside of our CRM and managing the leads and scheduling calls to follow up with them, so it’s important that you be organized
• Able to communicate orally and in writing in both english. If you have knowledge of Russian language - it is welcome
• Flexible - being a team player means that you’ll pitch in as needed with other task that the team will need help with
• High Speed Internet Connection - goes without saying that you should have a fast internet connection.
• Excellent Written English and Attention to Detail - You have to able to communicate extremely well in the written word and have absolute accuracy on documents you will prepare. This means structure, proper use of
nouns and adjectives, etc. Your ability to communicate precisely using the written word is very important.
• Pleasing personality - You well be interacting with clients, customers, and various business partners. So having a pleasing personality is a MUST. That means you are outgoing and positive when on the phone with people.
• It would be a BIG PLUS (but not 100% necessity) if you were bilingual (English / Russian).
COMPENSATION
This is an hourly position PLUS bonuses.
This position will begin as an hourly position and if all works out well, you’ll have an opportunity to earn bonuses for every deal that you help us purchase.
If the goal is for you to help us with 8-10 properties a month, this could mean a substantial bonus for you
All payments including bonuses would be done via card.

27.post_title: Experienced IT On-Site Field Technician Needed
27.description:
Techies 4 U, Inc. is looking to recruit a Field Engineer (IT Support Technician) to support a variety of clients throughout the Indiana region. The primary supporting locations are flexible as we have clients all around Indiana. We are looking for Field Engineers with hands on experience in the IT field or the knowledge and capability to support on-site IT work with no training.
Technicians will be able to dispatch from their home location and will not be required to come into an office, but may be required to come in periodically for admin responsibilities, tool transfers, etc.
High Level understanding of IT Rooms, Systems, and Computers is a requirement.
A working vehicle is a requirement as travel to each client site (most of the time multiple sites per day) is a requirement. Mileage is reimbursed.
Technicians should know how to perform the following tasks:
1. Terminate Copper cabling (Cat5e, Cat6)
2. Properly run copper cabling
3. Perform IT break/fix - resolve computer problems
4. Knowledge of Switches, Firewalls, Routers, WIFI devices
5. How to properly dress and clean up cabling
Knowledge in the following fields is a plus, but not required:
1. Fiber Cabling Work including termination
2. Experience installing Ladder racks
3. Full IT Telecom room setup
4. Experience installing structure cabling in large warehouse / factory environments
5. OSHA Safety Certifications
6. Boom Lift and Hydraulic Lift Certifications
7. NVR Security Installation experience
8. POTS line / 66 block experience
9. VOIP installations Experience
We are looking for a long term contract commitment and quickly promote our technicians upon completion of certain milestones with our company. Our company believes that our front line, customer facing engineers are the base of our company's success.
Perks:-
1. Hours are flexible, there are many positions available-
2. You can dispatch from your home.
We need someone with a knack for Troubleshooting. New problems come up everyday, so we don't always have an immediate answer to resolve the issues. We need problem solvers who can work the issue down to the root cause and then present a resolution.
All these are things you should have a basic understanding of:-
-Basic Cabling Knowledge (CAT 5, CAT6, Termination, What a 66 block is, what a Patch panel is, what a patch cable is, what a continuity test is.- Basic Switch / Networking Knowledge (Brands and Quirks - Juniper, Cisco, Dell, Etc., How they fit in a rack, what the different ports on the front or back are for).
- Cable Management (enterprise) experience (How to manage rack, ladder rack, and retail setting cabling professionally with ties, neat and clean.)
- OS troubleshooting experience (windows & mac, for this you really, basically, just need to know how to use google..)
- POS experience (Most of this will be on-site learning, but check out some of the different POS systems like Aloha, IBM, PAR, etc. - these are basically just custom cased all in one touchscreen computers - not expected that you will have experience with these, but if you do, that will help move you up the list.)
- Basic IT Hardware knowledge (Switch, Rack, Ethernet, RJ45, RJ11, IP address, DNS, Firewall, Modem, Router, Enterprise Router, Fiber cabling, punchdown tool, network crimper, cable tester, etc,)
- CMD line experience (ipconfig commands are the majority of what we use here, but occasionally some other ones come into play; basically just know how to get to a command prompt and navigate)
- Console Cable experience (basically just know how to plug in a cable to a switch, but google how to telnet or use putty if you want to learn more on this -

52.post_title: Refresh Civics Website with Appealing Game/Quiz
52.description:
3branchesofgovernment.com is a wordpress site that has been online for a few years. I’ve been trying to get it to rank on the first page for the obvious keyword (I need help with SEO but that is another GIG). It has a few pages of relevant content but I really want it to have one simple fun and easy feature to make it takeoff. I’ve recently paid to have the theme updated but I am not satisfied with it and also found out that the site speed sucks. I’ve had a game created years ago that is embedded onto the site and that is what I would like to focus on bringing front and center. 
My vision is to have something fun, simple and useful on the homepage. Some of the most successful, liked, shared and visited things are SIMPLE. Meaning the visitor goes to the website and they encounter ONE main thing that they interact with and share because it was relevant to the topic and served its purpose. I’m thinking a lightweight game or visually appealing quiz. Something that is a step up from the quizzes/puzzles that you can embed into a website. So I need someone to upgrade and improve the current game, make something similar but better and feature it front and center on the homepage. Most important it must help the visitor learn and remember what the 3 branches of government are. I want to put out something that actually has a positive impact on the people that use it. 
I had something created years ago but not sure how well it’s functioning on all devices. It can and should be utilized or upgraded and put on the homepage if you feel that is the best and most cost effective solution. The game is here: http://3branchesofgovernment.com/quiz/
I would like a way to either capture visitor emails after they take the quiz or play the game. Maybe require their email to find out their score or to be entered into a free monthly raffle of all the winners. I can possibly give a flag or copy of constitution away each month. Other option would provide the visitors their score, grade or a digital certificate so that they can share on it on whatever social platforms they may be using. But again...this all needs to be simple for the visitor...think EASY!   
TRUMP: I rather not bash Trump because I want teachers to be able to share and use the website in schools so it must remain neutral. If anything I was thinking of using something like “Can you name the three branches of government? Find out if you are stable genius! Play the 3 Branches Game!” Because he referred to himself as a stable genius. We can also have an icon created of him as he explores or helps people learn about the 3 branches through the game. But remember the game needs to be quick and easy...just one level. If it works, then it can be expanded in the future because I don’t have the funds for something complex. 
Constitution day is September 17th, 2019 and I feel this would be a good day to have the site refreshed (again) and shared with some sort of cute/fun/interesting/simple game or quiz that is on the homepage. So the deadline to do this is a little over two weeks. There is a yearly survey conducted around the same time and only 32% of Americans can name the 3 branches of government. I would like the idea to be response or tied into that statistic and ready for Constitution day. I am not looking for an intensive...heavy and complex website. I want it to be a website that other developers or designers go to and think...wow why didn’t I think of that? Do you have a long term vision and ideas? Then let me know and maybe we can figure a way to keep the site improving and expanding on a monthly basis. 
Please be interested in what I explained to you and know what you are doing. I’m looking for someone that “gets it” and can make my idea into a reality within the timeframe without putting me in debt or you having to slave away for hours in front of the computer working on something complex and frustrating. I would like to hire someone that enjoys what they do, has the talent to deliver on my request and is more interested in seeing something created that is well received...becomes a hit and take credit for it. I’m not looking for someone that wants to make a quick buck off delivering another “task”. If you are really good and help me with this then you would be hired again and also recommended. I’m just frustrated with hiring folks and getting bland results. I am a one person broke entrepreneur working a day job so I do not have a large budget so keep that in mind when you send me an estimate. I don’t expect you to work for free and you will be paid whatever price is agreed upon. 
Any illustrations and written content can be provided. I do not want to use stock photos. If you are able to provide customized graphics or know someone that would be a match for this project you can let me know. 
Summary: This is a wordpress website focused on civics. It needs a revamp that can be ready by or before Sept 17th. I would like an interactive quiz or game that is SIMPLE yet stunning on the homepage. It must be website based, lightweight and function on all devices. The new concept must either capture emails and/or provide the ability to share the results of the participants. I would like it to have the best and easiest solution for visitors to leave comments and have a running conversations of the comments under it like you would find on popular news or gossip sites. The current articles and everything else can be minimized so the new feature shines. Only after the site takes off and has the trust of the visitors would I add ads so I can possibly start making back all the money I’ve put into it. The goal is to create something useful related to the topic. 
If you’ve read this for and interested...
-Do not copy and paste responses and resumes that you send to everyone else. 
-Give me your thoughts and ideas on my request.
-Point me to a few things you created so I can see your capabilities. 
-Provide me your solution(s) that you have in mind and the approximate cost.
-Ask me questions if you need clarification on something. 
-Let me know why you want to work on this.  
I’m sorry about the long rant but I’ve been pumping money and time into this idea for years, I want it to work but also want it to be useful. I’m not crazy and actually easy to work with. I just want to find someone that understands my vision and my current situation. I cannot and will not respond to every proposal. I will respond to those I am interested in working with. Thank you for your time and interest in my project.

Westchester County Cell Phone Repair is looking for a self-driven technician to help us grow our brand and our company.
Our commitment to customer satisfaction is a direct result of the rapid growth of our company within Westchester County. We handle everything from iPhones, iPods. iPads, Samsung's, tablets, to laptops and computers.
We're looking for Technology-minded person in tune and up-to-date with current wireless gadgets and associated gear. As a company, we have a huge growth plan in place. We need people just like you that thrive in a constantly evolving environment that can adapt to the ever-increasing demand for gadget service and cutting edge accessories.
Basic Qualifications:
- Outstanding customer service skills
- Must demonstrate technical, problem-solving, and analytic skills
- Strong written and oral communication skills
- Must work well in a team environment
- Must be willing to sell products
- Must be punctual
- Ability to work flexible hours, including weekends (we are closed for most major holidays)
Tasks, Duties, and Responsibilities:
- Diagnose, troubleshoot and repair devices
- Explain complex technical issues to customers in a non-technical, simple to understand manner
- Must feel comfortable self-teaching
- Willingness to grow within the company

Required Qualifications :

- Must have top tier, high level, cell phone and table repair experience.

We are specifically looking for a candidate to fill in the following days:

Wednesday: 9am-7pm
Based upon performance, we can bring you on board for a Full-Time Position at $13 - $16 an hour.
Please reply to this email with a cover letter and resume. Thank you!
Visit our website at: WCCPR.COM

90.description:
Hello,
Our company is seeking an individual to work at our office at 20th Street in tandem with our Programmer - you will be assisting her in our efforts towards converting a website from Joomla to a more traditonal PHP architecture. Our project entails taking content from a Joomla Page and transfering it over to out new PHP Template. The work is not difficult and would be a good project for someone looking to build ther professional portfolio. 
Overview
• Solid understanding and experience with HTML, CSS, vanilla Javascript and jQuery.
• Basic Photoshop experience.
• Familiarity with PHP or other backend language to be comfortable working with pages that have PHP in them.
• Ability to write clean, well formatted code (html/css/javascript)
• Know how to use regular expressions pattern matching.
We're looking for an in-house candidate who can work with us in developing and improving our existing websites. 
Our goal is to find the right individual who can perform many basic-tier functions: 
1. HTML programmer (not WYSIWYG user)
2. Graphic Design / Editing (Photo Resizing, Custom Graphic Design, Etc.) 
You'll need an excellent command of all facets of front-end web development.
The ability to craft good quality written content independently 
In essence; we need a person who is HTML savvy + has some Graphic Design Skills
Don't apply if you can't meet the requirements... 
The ideal candidate will work closely with myself and our company principle in development...
The hours of operation needed would be between 3 to 5 hours a day, Mon through Fri.
It's just as important you have a strong work ethic, are a problem-solving whiz, have notable organizational skills, and above all, are detail-oriented. If you can boldly check off those things, you've already piqued our interest.
Qualifications:
- Rock-solid in front-end development; HTML, CSS.
- Support A-grade browsers and accessibility 
- PHP and SQL skills is necessary 
- 3 - 4 years of prior development experience in internet advertising, product advertising, and/or site development strongly preferred
- Create HTML and CSS from scratch (*NO WYSIWYG EDITING*)
- Maintain super-clean coding practices; excellent documentation
- Are extremely efficient; can manage multiple projects at once 
- Have extensive experience with cross-platform/browser development
- Comfortable with basic Unix command line operations
Do not apply if:
- you wish to work from Home 
- you're a designer who dabbles in HTML/CSS/JS
- your code is unorganized
- you've never been part of a large project
- you've never used a CMS before 
- you can't see that something is out of alignment by one pixel
- the only interaction with a server you've had is via FTP
- you don't have "first-hand" knowledge of what a JS form validator is 
Principals only. Recruiters, please don't contact this job poster.
Please, no phone calls about this job!
Please do not contact job poster about other services, products or commercial interests.
To apply - please respond with the Subjectline ""Inhouse" Front End Developer Position"
We will be culling out all canidates that cannot pay attention to detail

94.post_title: We Need USA only Website Application Testers
94.description:
We Need USA only Website Application Testers
I am a software developer (www.signOnDoc.com) and need web site application testers (Up to 25 USA testers) to test my websites for functionality while recording their use of these sites on their personal computer screens.  
The test time is no less than 45 minutes; Max time is about 1 hour 15 minutes. You must install a screen recorder app on your system before you start, to give us the copy of your screen recording.  
We pay $10.00 max per hourly test by PAYPAL only. 
You must be an undergraduate and have some knowledge of business documents.  It would be good if you can find any bugs or improvements in our software, but you do not have to find a bug to get paid.  Just send a copy of the screen recording by email attachment and once we see that you did test our system for about an hour (plus or minus 15 minutes), we shall pay you.  
Before you start you must give us your email address that you will use to create an account at our site and also get paid from PAYPAL (It has to be same email only) . We shall give you access to premium membership within a day or so; for one day or so you can test our premium features.  
We have 5 different portals and will need repeat testing of the upgraded features every week, so we need serious people only. The first website is www.signOnDoc.com (others will follow every week). This work is for North Americans only. Positively no foreigners please.  
There are plenty of free screen recorders available (I can send you few, if needed). The time of the day to test is up to you (You decide when you can do it). This application is to test e-signatures on documents by various parties. The emailed (documents) sent to other parties (if they agree to participate) will also get paid provided they also record their screens also.  Max two persons one on test (Max $20.00).  
No mobile phone testing please.  It must be on desk top or laptop (Full OS; any windows, Linux or MAC OS). Any questions please ask before you start. 
Thanks for participation. 
Happy Testing!!!

96.post_title: Body mind spirit author/orator seeks personal assistant
96.description:
After narrowly escaping physical death, in many dark nights of the soul, it became my passion to transform from attorney to one who help others through my trials and tribulations which were blessings. I do so through various channels. In the end everything really culminates in increasing physical well-being, mental health, consciousness, awareness, wakefulness, and inner peace.
A little more so you may have a frame of reference: I resurrected myself from near physical death, and inner mental/emotional death. I changed my course in life to share my personal healing with others which led to a 20 year body mind Spirit mission, plus a 3 month course derived therefrom soon to be recorded and published for worldwide distribution to help others around the world. This multi-level wide-ranging comprehensive course shall help radically change and save many lives, plus save many from inner hell for the uncountable suffering inside, or those who just want to go higher and wake up on whatever level they may.
I also am an attorney who specializes in self-defense law, meaning fighting for the rights of those who defend themselves as victims, who at times wind up being a victim of a sometimes unfair to judicial system. I recently published a powerful informative book in furtherance of such.
I further have intentions of speaking out on political and social issues, and possibly entering the political realm eventually. Much of this has to do with becoming aware of programming, and understanding what is really going on behind the scenes.  
A personal assistant who is attuned with what I do and I would be quite helpful. I am incredibly disorganized; paperwork freaks me out, and that includes "online paperwork." Need somebody who is my sort of better "business-half" to balance what I'm good at and not good at; I am much more not good at things than I am good at things.
The talent and skills necessary to help me is varied. However one does not necessarily need all of these talents and skills. Some is better than none.
Some of the talents and skills would be:
-Many more books audios and courses are coming and I need help editing them. 
-The written books and some courses need to be loaded into Adobe.
-These books audios and courses need to be uploaded onto Amazon and such.
-Some of these books audios and courses may be audio and/or video so knowledge of editing such of any type good.
-Ability to create book covers and logos and edit pictures and such via graphic design and such good.
-Have two websites that need attention.
-Have several YouTube channels that need videos uploaded into such and more.
-Have newsletters that need attention facilitation and creation and such.
-Need some of my business and private phone calls done during the day.
-Need promotion of the books videos and courses that I am developing. This would include contacting television, radio, podcasts, YouTube channels, Internet outlets, etc., to acquire appearances of me to promote.           -Creation and upkeep of affiliate links.
-Ideally would like to dictate books and have them transcribed, so transcription ability good such as being out the type very well while listening to me speak out books.
-Knowledge of graphic design for book covers and such. 
Yes a Jane or Jack of all trades ideally sought.
*PLEASE LET ME KNOW WHICH OF ANY OF THESE ABILITIES YOU HAVE, AND ANY OTHER POSSIBLE APPLICABLE TALENTS.
Honesty loyalty trust stability and dedication are valued by me above all else. 
Some fluidity with body mind Spirit and/or passion to help serve others a positive element, though not mandatory.
I am uniquely different in every which way, including what I teach. I am the epitome of non-conventional. I do not come in a neat square box; I do not like boxes. 
I also have vast goals, so it would be good if monumental success and public notoriety provokes your inner passion. 
We are living in a world that is a mixture of beautiful and well not so beautiful. With that our process of working together will start slow so we are both sure we are on the same page, and build trust as trust also is paramount to me. 
Because I serve people in Spirit much more so than money I am not flush with cash. Accordingly my ability to pay hourly has limits. And, at first, the hours will start off low and slow, let's say maximum five hours or so per week, and most probably grow over time as hopefully trust is formed, and as these materials are brought to the public and begin to generate profit to pay for increased hours and hourly wages and such. So I need somebody who is understanding of this, patient, and willing to work together toward a better future.
Accordingly I would appreciate if you would respond with how much you feel comfortable working for per hour minimally so I know if or even on the same page. Though over time there is no ceiling or limit.
As well, under no circumstances will I hire anyone who cannot come to me for an in person interview; not happening. (If distance is a true genuine issue, I am open to the possibility of doing interviews through Skype, Facetime, etc.). I am located on the South Shore of Long Island. 
If you choose to reply be aware that although my core is Spirit and my purpose is service, this is not my first rodeo, and I learned all too well regrettably to deal with new people very carefully. Accordingly, to start off with, please reply with full legal name, legitimate social media links, phone number, and spell out your e-mail address as it is not seen in your response through Craig's. 
As well please take some time to fill me in on who you are, some things about you, and importantly why you want to serve with me. If you cannot take the time to do that, you probably don't have the dedication it takes to make this happen.
This is a profound opportunity to profoundly help others, and in doing so you shall profoundly help yourself.

101.post_title: SAHM'S TO WORK AT HOME - IN NEW CAREER AS A TRAVEL AGENT
101.description:
Are you a Stay At Home Mom (or Dad) or want to become one? Are you sick & tired of working at the local "McJob" for very little pay? Are you ready to leave the 'rat race' and work in the comfort of your home (or RV)?
* Can you multi-task?
* Can you ask questions & carry on a conversation on the phone?
* Can you provide customer service?
* Can you perform basic math (add, subtract, multiply, divide, percentages)?
* Can you work without a boss? Actually, your calendar will be your boss.
* Can you have fun hunting for bargains?
WHY AREN'T YOU A TRAVEL AGENT?! 
https://calendly.com/agenttravelbiz/step-1
TELECOMMUTE - No more expensive clothes... no more make up... no more traffic jams... no more daycare... no more office gossip, no more sexual harassment, and no more political correctness!
FLEX TIME - Work from home when the kids are asleep, playing outside, or at school. You control your time commitment. You control your income. NO monthly sales quotas. Part-time, Full-time, Your-time.
MOBILE - When you and your spouse are transferred to a new city or state your travel business moves with you!
NO LONG-TERM CONTRACT - We understand "life happens." If, for any reason, you must put your travel business on hold we'll create a "place holder" for you. All earned commissions will be paid as they come in and you will not have to pay any fees or penalties after you leave. Once trained, if you leave voluntarily, you are always welcome to come back!
2019 TAX BENEFIT - You can hire your kids and legally deduct $12,000 per child per year from your own income. Their deductible 'salaries' pay for anything (i.e. diapers, food, school supplies, vacations, etc)! https://www.kitces.com/blog/tax-rules-hiring-children-family-business-flsa-tax-savings-standard-deduction-roth-contribution/
FREE unlimited training included from the best vendors (i.e. Disney, Carnival, Princess, Sandals, Travel Agent Universe, etc.).
EARN WHILE YOU LEARN - We will teach you how to access "travel agent ONLY" wholesale sites (i.e. VAX, Expedia TAAP, ATG, plus 18 more) to generate immediate commissions. We will also show you how to Specialize & Brand your travel business on social media.
GOOGLE "Archer Travel" (Montrose CA). We dare you to find negative press about us. Find us in the Better Business Bureau. We have an "A+" rating!
NOTE: You will be a 1099 independent contractor, not a W-2 employee. Which means we cannot mandate your time commitment, amount or speed of your training, the amount of time you want off, nor how much travel you wish to take. Your level of performance is completely up to you. You tell us how much you want to make, and we will work with you to make it happen.
CLICK HERE, https://calendly.com/agenttravelbiz/step-1, to schedule a call with Andrea, EVP of Recruiting (U.S.), for a 10-15-minute phone interview. If we believe you are a good fit you will receive a link to watch a 30-minute video of a Live Q&A webinar (it is packed full of information, so find a quiet place & take notes).
FAQs
"WITH ONLINE TRAVEL AGENCIES AREN'T "BRICK-N-MORTAR" TRAVEL AGENCIES A DYING BREED?" - 99% of households have a kitchen, yet there are over one million restaurants in the U.S. generating $799 Billion (National Restaurant Assoc.). In 2017, an article in Forbes said, "...booking travel is the sole profession for travel agents and the good agents can be extremely helpful when you have complex routes or simply don't have the time to research and book the travel yourself."
"ARE LEADS PROVIDED OR DO I HAVE TO FIND MY OWN CUSTOMERS?" - We provide training to build your "book of business," at no additional cost. Our goal is to help you get profitable and stay profitable within your first 30-days.
"DO I HAVE TO ATTEND MEETINGS & ARE THERE QUOTAS?" - You will be a 1099 contractor, which means you control your time, your effort, your methods, your income. We can only make recommendations to guide you to success. We cannot require you to do anything, by law.
"IS THIS MULTI-LEVEL MARKETING OR SOME PYRAMID THING?" - We are a legitimate travel agency looking to train & support professional travel agents who will work from home. (Note: we have an excellent recruiting team; however, we will reward you for helping us build our global agency; we pay our agents to refer good people.)
How is your attention to detail? Write this number down (39843). You will need it to schedule your first interview.
This ad is running nationwide. ACT NOW-- This offer expires September 24, 2019
compensation: 80% commission (highest in the industry) + Profit Pool + Company Stock

140.post_title: Growth Stage Edtech Startup Hiring Full Stack Engineers
140.description:
PrepScholar's mission is to improve education at scale through technology. Our SAT/ACT prep program learns the strengths and weaknesses of each student and creates an individualized learning program through machine learning. It also motivates students to study through clear structure and behavioral feedback. You can think of it as an automated tutor that provides a compelling learning experience at scale. We also have a large organic content project with over a million monthly visitors to our free tools and articles. We believe we have a major advantage over other companies in our space because of our technology-centered and analytical approach to education.
You'll join PrepScholar as our second full stack engineer and work on projects to grow our company within test prep and beyond. You'll improve our prep program by building new features, using large datasets to iterate on A/B tests, and scaling to handle thousands of users. You'll develop free tools and data presentations to give millions of families worldwide better information to guide their decisions. You'll be a core part of our growth as we scale to becoming a national education brand.
We're a team of 20+ and growing, and we're based in Cambridge, MA next to the Charles River. Check us out at www.prepscholar.com
Skills & Requirements
We're looking for a generalist who enjoys learning and working with different technologies along the stack.
Our stack:
Sass, JQuery, Backbone
Django/Python
MySQL
AWS/Linux
Requirements:
+Strong foundation in computer science and software engineering, including competencies in data structures, algorithms, databases, software design and dev ops.
+Strong hands-on experience with our core technologies is a big plus. In particular:
+Python and Django
+JavaScript and JavaScript MV* frameworks like AngularJS, Ember, Knockout, or Backbone
Ideal candidate has:
+Experience deploying frequently
+Willingness to try new things and pick up new technologies quickly
+UX intuition and an eye for design
+Ability to work independently with low management overhead
+Excitement about startups in growth mode and about our company mission
+Location in Boston or willingness to relocate 
About Us
+Founded in 2013. We're profitable, growing, and bootstrapped, so you'll have stability and ability to build out a long-term vision.
+We have a lot of room to grow within test prep and education at large.
+We have a team of 20 full-time members and more part-time instructors.
+We have thousands of customers and a growing footprint of millions of visitors.
+We care about culture and a great work environment. We're flexible with schedule, have no scheduled overtime, conduct efficient meetings, and want minimal bureaucracy.
+Our office is in Cambridge on River Street. We have parking available and we're walking distance from the Central Square Red Line stop.
Why Join Us?
+You'll be an early engineer with an impact on company direction and culture.
+We offer competitive salary with perks like a new work machine, free catered daily lunch, drinks/snacks, and tools you need to be productive.
+We offer relocation assistance.
+You'll be building something meaningful. Education is a linchpin of our country's economy and empowers people to improve their own lives. For many reasons, education suffers throughout the country -- class sizes too large, methods outdated, teachers underpaid. Here's your chance to build a scalable solution that actually has impact.
To apply, please send an email to job.engineer@prepscholar.com with your resume. If you'd like, please include any of these: cover letter, GitHub profile, Hacker News profile, any project pages showing off your full stack work, or other portfolio.

178.post_title: Creative Digital Marketing Agency / Work From Home / Make Connections
178.description:
We are a Nashville based niche publisher and creative digital marketing agency looking for new clients for our web design build and boost packages.  http://www.agency43.com
What we sell: 
Creative design, web, and digital marketing packages for small local and niche businesses that range from $1,500-$5,000 and can go up to $20,000 with the right client and project.
What do you get? 
You receive 20% commissions on all new clients and projects you bring to us!  
Let's do some simple math:
- On a standard $5,000 design package, you make $1,000 commission just for making connections. 
- Bring just 2-3 new clients in each month and you make $3,000+ commission working at home, for as many hours as you want!  
- Work really hard just a few hours a day, bring in one new client a week and you earn $35-48,000 per year, working from home at your own pace. (We think that sounds pretty awesome!  If you do then send your resume)
- If you want to work full time, you could make even more... but there has to be time for family, walking the dog, kids, going to movies and other stuff)
This type of position would be great for: 
- Stay at home parent looking for flexible hours to make extra money for family 
- A person with a goal to become a sales person or own their own company one day 
- Retired person looking for something fun and rewarding to do during retirement (you can do this from anywhere)
- Someone who loves networking and is fascinated with helping people achieve their goals
- Young creatives and college students looking to learn more about working and selling in the creative web and digital marketing world.  (I would even hire a high school student who was mature and really wanted to work hard!) 
Is it a good fit for you? 
- If you are a good communicator, like to meet new people, and like to help people this will be fun and profitable for you.  
- If you need flexible hours, nobody breathing down your neck or expecting you to show up at an office everyday this will make you very happy.  
- If you like working with creative people, business owners, artists, and people with awesome ideas about the future, this will be especially fun for you... Your job will be to meet and network in those circles (online, on social media and wherever you want to go)
We will lay out some basic plans for easy success and many of them can be done from home with no pressure or typical sales strategies.  Some include posting links and images on social media sites, blogs etc but you can be as creative as you like with reaching new people... You are probably scrolling and commenting on social media everyday anyway.  Other approaches can be taken like a standard sales position... we are ok with that too because it works!    Once you are hired on our team, orientation and training is done online though our online courses.  They are simple and give you the basics you will need to get started.  
Don't worry, you don't have to close the sales.  You just have to get a good conversation started and you get full commission when we close it!  We will work with most industries so you can use your contacts, strengths, and past relationships to introduce our company to people and make commission if they do a project with us!
If you would like to join our team, please forward a short cover email to this posting.  
(Small Print: If you do not attach a resume, we will most likely delete your communication, unless your cover letter is so amazing we can't pass you up... But seriously, attach a standard resume so we can get to know you.  Time is valuable and we like to work with people who can follow the most basic instructions about how to apply.)  
http://www.agency43.com

183.description:
Request for Quotation (RFQ) - Part Time Web Developer
Incorporated Research Institutions for Seismology
1200 New York Ave. NW, Suite 400
Washington, DC  20005
The Incorporated Research Institutions for Seismology (IRIS) is a consortium of over 125 universities dedicated to the operation of science facilities for the acquisition, management, and distribution of seismological data. IRIS facilitates investigations of seismic sources and Earth properties using seismic and other geophysical methods. It promotes the exchange of seismic and other geophysical data and knowledge through pursuing policies of free and unrestricted data access, and fosters cooperation among IRIS members, affiliates, and other organizations in order to advance seismological research and education, expand the diversity of the geoscience workforce, and improve Earth science literacy in the general public.
The IRIS website (www.iris.edu) is managed from the IRIS headquarter office located in Washington, DC, and runs on a RackSpace Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6.5 (PVHVM) virtual machine.  There are several subdomains on the main server, all being managed by separate instances of ExpressionEngine v2 that is running on PHP 5.5.38 and mysql 14.14.   
IRIS desires to engage a part-time web developer to migrate existing ExpressionEngine websites and add-ons to current software versions, maintain websites, and develop new applications as requested.  
SCOPE OF WORK
●	Migrate the existing ExpressionEngine website and its add-ons from version 2 to the most current software versions. Several add-ons were built in-house; therefore, code re-writes will be necessary for compatibility with the current version of ExpressionEngine.
●	Design, implement, and maintain various IRIS websites. Tasks include analyzing requirements, designing, coding, debugging and testing new features.
●	Create, customize, and maintain interactive web applications as requested
●	Provide miscellaneous support including basic troubleshooting, interfacing with the outside System Administrator, and interacting with the lead staff Web Developer
●	Provide support for an estimated 20-25 hours per week in initial phases, reducing to ongoing maintenance support of 5-10 hours per week, plus occasional projects as needed
●	Contractor located in the Washington, DC Metropolitan region is preferred
REQUIREMENTS
Working knowledge (3+ years of experience) in:
●	PHP v5 to v7, CodeIgniter, ExpressionEngine (including Templating and Add-on development), v 2 and 5
●	MySQL
●	JavaScript, jQuery
●	HTML, CSS (including Bootstrap v3)
●	Ability to work at the UNIX command line level 
●	Git version control
SUBMISSION REQUIREMENTS
Technical Submission must include the following: 
•	Overview of Capabilities/Skills
•	Statement of Experience
•	Examples of Work Product (e.g. code repository example)
•	Two Professional References
•	Date of availability to begin work 
Financial Submission must include the following:
•	Hourly Rate 
Please provide an hourly rate and any special pricing arrangements such as a pre-paid retainer contract or a monthly service agreement. 
Interested vendors should submit responses via email. Vendor responses are due no later than 5:00 p.m. ET on Monday September 23, 2019. 
All questions should be directed to the IRIS Sponsored Projects Office via email.  All vendor questions and answers will be made available to all potential bidders. 
The responses must be submitted to the proper email address and by the submission deadline to be considered for an award.
Excluded Parties 
Individuals or organizations who have assisted IRIS, directly or indirectly, in the preparation or evaluation of the RFQ leading to an Agreement; shall not submit a response, assist any other vendor in the preparation of a response, or perform under the Agreement in any capacity.  Individuals or organizations who are presently debarred, suspended, proposed for debarment, or declared ineligible for an award or contract by any Federal agency are not eligible to submit a response.
Rights of Retention
Following submission of quotes and final evaluation, IRIS will have the right to retain the responses, maintaining them in confidence.  All documents submitted in response to this RFQ shall become the property of IRIS.
EVALUATION CRITERIA	 
Submissions will be evaluated on experience and technical expertise in the following:   
Expression Engine, PHP, MySQL, JavaScript/jQuery, HTML, CSS Unix and Git version control. Samples of work product must be included.  
Customer references should also be provided.  These references will be contacted during the evaluation process.  IRIS will also evaluate contractor availability and cost as part of the process.  The final selection will be made on a best-value basis.
